title: The Mobbit: An Unexpected Minecraft Journey
description: (A Minecraft Parody of the Hobbit) (An Unofficial Minecraft Book)  Join Steve, The Mobbit, On Another Epic Minecraft Adventure!  Steve has agreed to help Gandoof and his twelve companions on a quest to get their treasure back from the evil Enderdragon.  Will Steve be able to survive the magical journey as he faces Zombies, wolves, evil Endermen and the all powerful Enderdragon?  Jump Into the adventure and find out!  Get Your Copy Today!

title: Velociraptor (Dinosaurs Alive!)
description: Aims to show dinosaurs not as museum exhibits but as living, breathing creatures. This book describes how they found food, fought off attackers and reared their young.

title: The Adventures of Spot the Tree Frog
description: Spot is a lonely tree frog, living in a tree in the front yard of a little house. To meet the family who calls this little house home--and to somehow become a part of that family--is Spot's dream.  But will it come true?

title: Superstars of Women's Tennis (Female Sports Stars)
description: Profiles some of the stars in the world of women's tennis, including Billie Jean King, Chris Evert, Martina Navratilova, Steffi Graf, and Monica Seles.

title: American Women In The Vietnam War (The American Experience in Vietnam)
description: Provides a look at the experiences and varied roles of women in the Vietnam War, describing the hardships and challenges they faced, and the continuing effects of the war on their lives.
